// Actions and types
import*as t from"../types";export var hideLoader=function hideLoader(){return{type:t.LoaderActionTypes.HIDE_LOADER};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(text){return{type:t.LoaderActionTypes.SET_LOADING,payload:text};};export var setSuccess=function setSuccess(text){return{type:t.LoaderActionTypes.SET_SUCCESS,payload:text};};export var setFailure=function setFailure(text){return{type:t.LoaderActionTypes.SET_FAILURE,payload:text};};
